nodes.text: How was your vacation?
The past few days have been most useful and interesting. I have learned many things that may be of value.
It was also good to be away from Caesari for a few days. He was most vociferous with his anger that you had thwarted him.
How are things going for you?
Better than they were last week, fortunately for us all.
What did you learn about pirates?
Ten years ago, a pirate ship, the Royal Flush, is reported to have been lost off the coast of Sardonia as it sailed to Caligari in the middle of a terrible storm.
Rumor has it that it was laden with treasure.
According to certain unsavory local sailors, the ship crashed into the sea caves. Miss MacMichael's map most likely leads to the treasure of the Royal Flush.
What's this about treasure?

The Royal Flush was said to have attacked a rich merchant ship from Hispaniola that was laden with goods and gold from Costa Nueva. The Flush held a king's ransom worth of goods when it was shipwrecked.
What else have you heard about the pirates?
The Captain of the Royal Flush was Dirty Deal Hoyle, a notorious gambler. It was said that he couldn't resist a bet. He won the "Royal Flush" in a massive Poobah game that lasted three days.
I played Poobah against the captain - and I won. Of course, he was a Zombie at the time...
That is very difficult for me to believe even though I am certain that you are trustworthy.
Where do you think I got this hat from? The Zombie Captain staked this in his bet.
It seems that I have underestimated your courage and sheer gall, Shawn. Playing Poobah against a Zombie pirate is a very impressive feat.
Katie and I found the treasure of the Royal Flush. It was every bit as impressive as the rumors tell.
You... and Katie... found the pirate treasure?
Yes, it was locked behind a magical wall and guarded by an ugly tentacled Horror, but we braved all the dangers and won the prize.
See, I've got some of the pirate booty on me now. I'm much richer than I was the day I first met you.
Most intriguing, Shawn. I believe that I shall have to carry some more costly items in my store to tempt you to spend some of that ill-gotten gain.
Got anything new in store?
Oh, yes... I came across a very valuable set of magical thieves' tools. They glow slightly in the dark and greatly improve your chance at successfully opening a lock.
You will find them most useful, don't you think?

options.text: Say Something Polite to Compliment Joel

nodes.text: You always have the niftiest things to sell, Joel. It's a pleasure shopping with you.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Amuse Joel

nodes.text: It's safe to say that you "lock" to "pick" the coins from my purse. With your prices, you are picking my pocket without moving a finger.
Did you give Sosi a set of those picks so that he could pass the Lockpicking tests - or do you just open all his locks for him? I doubt he can pick his own nose.
Heh, heh.
There's no need to be uncouth.
See you later.
Good day to you.
